question: At the magnet school with the highest percentage of students eligible for free or reduced-price meals in the 2021–22 academic year, what minimum GPA must students keep to remain eligible for extracurricular activities?
nl2sql_question: Which magnet school reports the highest K–12 free-or-reduced-price meal eligibility percentage for the 2021–22 academic year?
sql_answer: SELECT f."School Name" FROM frpm AS f JOIN schools AS s ON f.CDSCode = s.CDSCode WHERE s.Magnet = 1 AND f."Academic Year" = '2021-22' ORDER BY CAST(f."Percent (%) Eligible FRPM (K-12)" AS REAL) DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Student Handbook of the identified magnet school — narrative section outlining academic eligibility for extracurricular participation, specifically the minimum cumulative GPA students must maintain.

question: For the school district that oversees the high school with the greatest number of students scoring 1500 or higher on the SAT, how many community-service hours must students complete to graduate?
nl2sql_question: Which school district oversees the high school that has the highest count of students scoring 1500 or above on the SAT?
sql_answer: SELECT sat.dname FROM satscores AS sat JOIN schools AS sch ON sch.CDSCode = sat.cds WHERE sch.EILCode = 'HS' ORDER BY sat.NumGE1500 DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: The Graduation Requirements section of the identified district’s official student handbook, containing the specific numeric requirement for community-service hours that students must complete to earn a high-school diploma.

question: For the California county whose charter high schools post the highest average SAT mathematics score, what minimum cumulative GPA must students keep to be eligible for that county’s academic scholarship program?
nl2sql_question: Which California county has charter high schools with the highest average SAT Math score?
sql_answer: SELECT sch.County AS CountyName FROM schools sch JOIN satscores sat ON sch.CDSCode = sat.cds WHERE sch.Charter = 1 AND sch.EILCode = 'HS' GROUP BY sch.County ORDER BY AVG(sat.AvgScrMath) DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: County-level Academic Scholarship Program policy document for the identified county, containing narrative language that specifies the minimum cumulative GPA students must maintain to qualify for the scholarship.

question: For the high school with the most SAT test takers, what is the fee for a replacement student ID in its student handbook?
nl2sql_question: Which high school reports the highest number of SAT test takers?
sql_answer: SELECT s.School FROM schools AS s JOIN satscores AS ss ON s.CDSCode = ss.cds WHERE ss.rtype = 'S' AND s.EILCode = 'HS' ORDER BY ss.NumTstTakr DESC, s.School ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Student Handbook for the identified high school — narrative section on student identification cards detailing the replacement ID fee amount (in dollars), including any first-time waivers, conditions for damaged vs. lost IDs, payment methods, and the current-year effective date.

question: For the district that operates the magnet high school with the highest average SAT math score in Los Angeles County, what minimum GPA is required for students to participate in athletics?
nl2sql_question: Which district operates the magnet high school with the highest average SAT math score in Los Angeles County?
sql_answer: SELECT sch.District FROM schools AS sch JOIN satscores AS sat ON sch.CDSCode = sat.cds WHERE sat.rtype = 'S' AND sat.cname = 'Los Angeles' AND sch.Magnet = 1 AND sch.EILCode = 'HS' ORDER BY sat.AvgScrMath DESC, sat.sname ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: District Athletics Eligibility Policy manual for the identified district — narrative sections specifying the minimum GPA requirement for student-athlete participation, clarifying whether GPA is term or cumulative, any probation exceptions, and the policy’s effective date.

question: For the district that oversees the charter high school with the highest share of SAT test takers scoring at least 1500, what unpaid meal debt limit triggers alternate meals under its nutrition policy?
nl2sql_question: Which district oversees the charter high school with the highest proportion of SAT test takers scoring 1500 or higher?
sql_answer: SELECT s.District FROM satscores sc JOIN schools s ON sc.cds = s.CDSCode WHERE s.Charter = 1 AND s.EILCode = 'HS' AND sc.NumTstTakr > 0 ORDER BY CAST(sc.NumGE1500 AS FLOAT)/sc.NumTstTakr DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: District Nutrition Services Unpaid Meal Charges Policy for the identified district — narrative section that states the specific unpaid meal debt threshold at which students are provided alternate meals (e.g., a dollar cap or number of meals), along with any stated exceptions and effective date.

target_object.District: Santa Cruz County Office of Education

question: For the charter high school in Los Angeles County with the highest SAT math average, what is the application deadline for its enrollment lottery?
nl2sql_question: Which charter high school in Los Angeles County reports the highest average SAT math score?
sql_answer: SELECT s.School FROM schools AS s JOIN satscores AS t ON s.CDSCode = t.cds WHERE s.Charter = 1 AND s.EILCode = 'HS' AND t.cname = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY t.AvgScrMath DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Admissions and Lottery Policy section of the identified charter high school's parent/student handbook — narrative text specifying the annual enrollment lottery application deadline (exact date and any cut-off time), including any effective school-year notation and late-application handling.

question: For the school district that oversees the magnet school with the highest share of SAT test takers scoring 1500 or higher, what is the maximum number of unexcused absences that triggers a truancy referral?
nl2sql_question: Which district oversees the magnet school with the highest ratio of SAT takers scoring 1500+ to total test takers?
sql_answer: SELECT sc.District FROM schools sc JOIN satscores sat ON sc.CDSCode = sat.cds WHERE sc.Magnet = 1 AND sat.NumTstTakr > 0 ORDER BY CAST(sat.NumGE1500 AS REAL)/sat.NumTstTakr DESC, sc.School ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: District Student Attendance and Truancy Policy manual for the returned district — narrative section that states the exact number of unexcused absences that triggers a truancy referral (e.g., to SARB), including the defined timeframe (per semester, per school year, or consecutive days), any grade-level exceptions, and the effective date of the policy.

question: For the magnet high school with the highest SAT writing average, what is the maximum student parking permit fee per semester set in its campus parking operations memo?
nl2sql_question: Which magnet high school has the highest SAT writing average?
sql_answer: SELECT sch.School FROM schools AS sch JOIN satscores AS sat ON sch.CDSCode = sat.cds WHERE sch.Magnet = 1 AND sch.EILCode = 'HS' ORDER BY sat.AvgScrWrite DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Campus Parking Operations Memo for the identified high school — narrative text specifying student parking permit policies, including the per-semester maximum fee, any waiver conditions, and effective dates; no tables or structured grids.

question: For DC Comics’ tallest good-aligned superhero, what is the minimum age required for live-appearance performers who portray this character?
nl2sql_question: Which DC Comics superhero with Good alignment is tallest by recorded height?
sql_answer: SELECT s.superhero_name FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'DC Comics' AND a.alignment = 'Good' AND s.height_cm IS NOT NULL AND s.height_cm > 0 ORDER BY s.height_cm DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Character Portrayal Handbook for the identified DC Comics superhero — narrative section specifying the minimum age requirement for performers in live appearances portraying this character, including any exceptions, geographic variations, and the effective date of the rule.

question: For the publisher of the tallest good-aligned superhero who can fly, what is the maximum number of variant covers permitted for a single issue release?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher publishes the tallest superhero with 'Good' alignment who has the 'Flight' power?
sql_answer: SELECT pub.publisher_name FROM superhero sh JOIN alignment al ON sh.alignment_id=al.id JOIN hero_power hp ON sh.id=hp.hero_id JOIN superpower sp ON hp.power_id=sp.id JOIN publisher pub ON sh.publisher_id=pub.id WHERE al.alignment='Good' AND sp.power_name='Flight' AND sh.height_cm IS NOT NULL AND sh.height_cm>0 ORDER BY sh.height_cm DESC, sh.superhero_name ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Internal Publishing Standards memo for the identified publisher — narrative section outlining the cap on variant covers per single-issue release, including the definition of a 'variant cover,' any exceptions (e.g., anniversary issues, retailer exclusives), and the effective date of the limit.

question: For the publisher of the tallest good-aligned superhero who has the 'Flight' power, what standard royalty percentage applies to character-branded T-shirt merchandise?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher publishes the tallest Good-aligned superhero who has the 'Flight' power?
sql_answer: SELECT pub.publisher_name FROM superhero sh JOIN alignment al ON sh.alignment_id = al.id JOIN hero_power hp ON sh.id = hp.hero_id JOIN superpower sp ON hp.power_id = sp.id JOIN publisher pub ON sh.publisher_id = pub.id WHERE al.alignment = 'Good' AND sp.power_name = 'Flight' AND sh.height_cm IS NOT NULL AND sh.height_cm > 0 ORDER BY sh.height_cm DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Licensing Royalty Policy for the identified publisher — narrative section that lists standard royalty rates by product category, specifically the base percentage for character-branded adult T‑shirt apparel sold through standard retail channels (excluding promotional, direct-to-consumer, or regional exceptions).

question: For the good-aligned superhero who is tallest among those with the 'Flight' power, what minimum recommended age is set for their branded action figures in the character licensing guide?
nl2sql_question: Which good-aligned superhero with the Flight power has the greatest recorded (nonzero) height?
sql_answer: SELECT s.superhero_name FROM superhero s JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id JOIN hero_power hp ON s.id = hp.hero_id JOIN superpower sp ON hp.power_id = sp.id WHERE a.alignment = 'Good' AND sp.power_name = 'Flight' AND s.height_cm IS NOT NULL AND s.height_cm > 0 ORDER BY s.height_cm DESC, s.superhero_name ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Character Licensing and Merchandising Guidelines for the identified superhero — narrative text outlining retail product standards, specifically the minimum recommended age for that character’s action figures, stated as a single age threshold and any exception notes.

question: For the superhero with the highest Strength attribute, what is the maximum autograph session duration permitted by their character event guidelines?
nl2sql_question: Which superhero has the highest recorded Strength attribute value?
sql_answer: SELECT sh.superhero_name FROM superhero sh JOIN hero_attribute ha ON sh.id = ha.hero_id JOIN attribute a ON a.id = ha.attribute_id WHERE a.attribute_name = 'Strength' ORDER BY ha.attribute_value DESC, sh.superhero_name ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Character Event & Appearance Guidelines for the identified superhero — narrative policy text that explicitly states the standard maximum autograph session duration per appearance (in minutes), with applicability notes and exclusions for special VIP or charity events.
